titles.title: Lord, It Belongs Not To My Care

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord, It Belongs Not To My Care Whether I Die Or Live; To Love And Serve Thee Is My Share, And This Thy Grace Must Give.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: If Life Be Long, I Will Be Glad That I May Long Obey; If Short, Yet Why Should I Be Sad To Soar To Endless Day?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Christ Leads Me Through No Darker Rooms Than He Went Through Before; He That Into God’s Kingdom Comes Must Enter By This Door.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Come, Lord, When Grace Has Made Me Meet Thy Blessed Face To See; For If Thy Work On Earth Be Sweet, What Will Thy Glory Be?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Then Shall I End My Sad Complaints, And Weary, Sinful Days, And Join With The Triumphant Saints That Sing my Savior's Praise.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: My Knowledge Of That Life Is Small, The Eye Of Faith Is Dim; But ‘Tis Enough That Christ Knows All, And I Shall Be With Him.
